MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW12 postcode area of Congleton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:44am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are waiting for contractors to arrive on site to refuel the generator , we are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7am on 7th January
